website_summaries.verdict: Offers great benefits at a decent price for many consumers, but not everyone can use it.
pros: One of the more affordable options we considered
Precision brush makes it easy to apply
Some users rave about noticeably longer lashes after only a few weeks of use
cons: Not the best pick for sensitive eyes, as some users report burning/itching/swollen skin after use

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. After a pregnancy, my eyelashes kept breaking and falling off. Within a few weeks of ordering this, people were asking if I got extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bender

customer_reviews.title: this is the first one that lengthens my lashes like crazy AND doesn’t cause eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several products, and aside from Rodan and Fields (like $170 but totally works), this is the first one that lengthens my lashes like crazy AND doesn’t cause eye irritation. Ive recommended this to several of my girlfriends. I don’t have a before pic, but the one attached are my lashes after one month of use and two coats of mascara. My lashes touch my eyebrows! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Irritated lash line and was unable to continue use beyond 2 nights. Tried more than once after allowing lid irritation to subside but ... happened again. Had to return. Returning was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: LauraA

customer_reviews.title: Eyes turned blood red
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a terrible reaction. My eyes were red for two weeks, and now that I look at other recent reviews it looks like it’s happening to a lot of people. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have eye sensitivity DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: If you have eye-sensitivity to mascara, eye-liner, or eye-shadow do not purchase this product. My vision became blurred and my eyes teared. Had to remove it immediately and wash my eyelids
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed container
customer_reviews.text: Container is not designed to properly dispense product. I think half of it was wasted so I can’t say if it actually worked. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work one bit! Used it as directed and nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not as claimed
customer_reviews.text: I applied this product religiously every evening and saw zero results. I've had better results just upping my biotin rather than this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: It made my skin around my eyes itchy, flaky & red. Will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Very irritating
customer_reviews.text: They work, but you look weird with red, bruised-looking eyes (and itchy).
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Not Irritation Free!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. Within 15 minutes of using this (for the first time) my eyes got super itchy and red. I washed off immediately, thank goodness I didn't go to bed and leave it on all night, I imagine I would have woken up to a bad situation.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Joy

customer_reviews.title: SURROUNDING AREA RED AND ITCHED AND STUNG A BIT
customer_reviews.text: Surrounding areas turned red and burned. Tried to use much less and still made my eyes burn, water and surrounding area was red. Waiting a few days and tried again...same response. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Got my lashes back!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed results 2 weeks in. I’m so happy with this product! Finally decided to take off my lash extensions off after 2 years so my natural lashes were very sad looking. Let’s put it this way: it would hurt to curl my lashes and forget about putting mascara on- it was pointless :( This product has brought my lashes back to life! I started getting compliments on my lashes and i recommend this product to all my friends- Along with a good lash curler and mascara, you too, will get your lashes looking full in no time! I use it nightly and i’m hoping i see more results. I’ll keep you posted. But for now, i am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: talina

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best product to grow your lashes
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best product to grow your lashes. My lashes used to be half of this length and in just two weeks they grew dramatically. I used to have lash extensions and now my lashes are just as long as when I had them in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachyl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to write a review that matched all the reviews and claims that it gave them amazing thicker longer lashes but in truth it doesn't work. I applied the serum every morning and night and there was absolutely no change in appearance to my lashes. It was a waste of my time. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Saren

customer_reviews.title: actually works
customer_reviews.text: I saw results after a month, but you should be patient if you don't get results as fast...it is waiting on your hair to grow after all. Hair growth takes time. I wasn't expecting results until 3 months. I can especially notice the difference on my lower lashes. Before you couldn't even tell I had any, but now with mascara you can see them. All my lashes are getting longer. I use at night after I shower and in the morning after I shower and before make up (if I wear any). I'm wearing fiber mascara in this pic, but my lashes look amazing after 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Shammy

customer_reviews.title: Updated- Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Update— the company reached out to me very apologetic and refunded me my money. I appreciate their customer service to try to make it right. I do wish this product had worked for me. Hate this product. My issue with lashes has always been length. As you can see on the top “before” pic, my lashes are naturally short. Been using this product for a month and my lashes are just falling off. I have gaps in my eyelashes, they are just falling off like flower petals. I decide to try this as it said it was a gentle formula. BS! It’s horrible. Stay away.middle pic and bottom pic are my eyelashes today. I’m horrified.
customer_reviews.author: BusyLizzie415

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Use it religiously and you will get results! Both before and after pictures have mascara on!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: you'll actually see and improvement in your lashes!  It works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm aging and losing my lashes. You're not going to believe this, but I use this Serum sporadically and I have lush lashes again! My lashes are blond, so now you can actually see my lashes thanks to this serum. I didn't really expect it to work, but I'm very happy with this purchase. I think any lady that's losing her lashes, or who is aging, and losing her lashes, would love this serum. I'm super happy thaT I purchased this serum and would definitely recommend buying this serum.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Hello dream lashes
customer_reviews.text: This serum really works. Simple to use and it doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. I've used it just about every night and the results have been incredible. I am on my third bottle in just over a year. I do wish there were more product for the price. With that said, I'll still definitely purchase again because it's so effective!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Little

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as Latisse in terms of fullness- not quite as long but close
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of paying for Latisse so I gave this a shot. The Latisse made my eyelashes absurdly long. But it wasn't always consistent- like just a few would grow like crazy. This is less irritating, way cheaper, and after using it every night for 3 weeks, my eyelashes are full, healthy and all of the lashes are longer. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miemis

customer_reviews.title: But so far I like it. I've done fake lashes both strip and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for only a week so far and I see a big difference in the thickness. My lashes are actually so thick that it's kinda pokey. Obviously there isn't much of a difference in length yet so I will update. But so far I like it. I've done fake lashes both strip and extension but for me.. Serum and then perm is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Phaphon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing grew
customer_reviews.text: Since the reviews were so positive about Essy, I bought a tube. I wanted so much to like this serum since it was a less expensive alternative to others, but it truly did nothing for my lashes. I followed the directions to the tee, but nothing grew. I've had excellent results with other serums, but for some reason not this one.
customer_reviews.author: BlucheGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product. Ive been using it for about 2 weeks and don't notice any difference in my lashes except that my eyes feel sticky when I wake up in the morning. I've had much better results with Latisse although it did cause slight darkening under my eye but it wasn't that bad. I'm going to keep using this for another 2 weeks but so far, not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ocmommy2

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for over a year. It really helps grow longer lashes and increase thickness of lashes. I apply it about 10 min before I apply make up in the morning and try to apply twice daily on weekends when I don’t wear eye makeup. Try it for 30 days and you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL A.

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't deserve any stars! VERY disappointing & I'm seriously wondering who initially gave it such glowing reviews? Absolutely NO results after over a month. Some itching & irritation. A waste of money? Can I get a refund???
customer_reviews.author: Victoria DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for the last few months and have not noticed a difference in my lashes. I use it every night and there is no growth or anything. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maia LaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with using their product, it didn’t have a weird smell or irritate my very sensitive eyes. I would use it at night so I could go straight to bed and not obsess over my eyes with this product on. It is so easy to use, even I can do it and I’m a complete idiot at makeup and things
customer_reviews.author: Linda Napper

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works. I was skeptical. I apologise for my freshly washed allergy ridden eyes in the pictures, but they are taken 3 months apart and both length and volume increased. What’s not clear from the pictures is that my lashes also gained a little curve/curl to them that they have never had before. They used to grow straight out like an awning. I am very pleasantly surprised. No side effects or irritation at all.
customer_reviews.author: Moviemum

customer_reviews.title: It seriously works!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely skeptical about this and even some other reviewer‘s photos because the “after photos” look like they could just be wearing mascara... However I do not wear make up ever, I took a photo before I started using it, one month after using it regularly a.k.a. every day (middle pictures) and then I kind of died off and was only doing it about 3 to 4 times a week (because I forgot/got lazy) and now I am at month two and YES, IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Irritated Red Eyes
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product! Only used 2 times. And for two days my eyes swelled and blushed. Don't risk your health
customer_reviews.author: NEBIHE LAFCI

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely can not believe that this product not only did what it said it was going to do, but the results were nothing less than AMAZING!!! I wish I had taken a before and after photo, but to be honest I never expected it to work . I am 58 years young and my eyebrows and eyelashes were not only thinning, but were none existent in places. I had plucked my brows untill there was very little left to them. Not only have my brows grown back in, but my lashes are LONG.... LONG I said!!! I have always had stubby lashes, but no more. I am sold. I will never be without this product. Thank you Thank you
customer_reviews.author: gratefull

customer_reviews.title: Also works on eyebrows!! It didn’t grow here in places where I don’t have Hair anymore but it did make where eyebrows grow thick
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Within two weeks I saw quite a difference in with continued use I actually couldn’t believe my ‘Eyes’ And how long my lashes Got; I never had long lashes! This was very reasonably priced so I took a chance I can’t believe that it works just as good as some of these more expensive products triple the price according to what my friends tell me Must use consistently, I had no stinging or irritation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. And that was not even the reason ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical and I got it for eyelash growth because I lost a huge portion, which were not growing back even after two months. Once I started using this stuff my eye lashes got SOO DARK. I love it. And that was not even the reason I got this. My eyelashes are fully back, which could be partly due to time, but I think there is a small bit due to the serum. Eye lashes are defiantly longer, which I love too. I do apply it quite a bit, which I think helps.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, this product has produced results for me, even though my use has been somewhat inconsistent. My lashes are longer and more filled in. I don't use it on my eyebrows. I'd had a stressful year, ending with the death of someone very close to me. My sleep schedule was seriously interrupted and my lashes had become very thin. I was looking for a more natural product instead of an expensive pharmaceutical one with potentially serious side effects. Took a chance on this one and even though I sometimes forget to use it every night, this product has produced pretty good results. Seems a good value for the price and results. It does not irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lesuse

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because of the great reviews that it got. I had been using the R&F product that is super expensive— it worked but I didn’t want to spend that much money again so I gave Essy a try. What I really noticed about Essy is that it works pretty good on my eyebrows. I’ve been brushing it on the sparse areas at night and they are starting to get thicker. Another bonus is that I have not had any irritation. I didn’t give it 5 stars because I haven’t noticed a huge difference in my lashes. It could be because o haven’t been using it long enough.. if that changes after time I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: I tried several lash lengthening serums before Essy with little to no improvement. I have very sparse eye lashes and thought nothing would help. Well, I used Essy for about a month before I noticed that my lashes were actually growing. A miracle. I have used this product for about four months and I am very pleased. My once wimpy lashes are longer and thicker. Now when I curl them and put on mascara, I can actually see my lashes. I know they will never have that luxurious look, but I have to be realistic. I also started using waterproof mascara which was recommended on a blog to better hold the curl. This seems to help as well.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: It truly works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when my daughter gave this to me for Mother's Day, but my very sparse lashes are now thicker and more surprisingly longer! Since I have very blond lashes they are still hard to see without mascara and are not as thick as I would like, but there is noticeable improvement. I prefer to apply it by getting the serum on my finger and running it across the rims of my eyes. I've just started using it on my brows so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Regretwy

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately did nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: this company has been emailing me since I posted this review offering to pay me to either take down this 1* review or change it to a positive. I would be EXTREMELY wary of the high reviews of this product. They are clearly buying good reviews. Incredibly dishonest and disappointing. I did not see any changes to my lashes after weeks of using this serum. I looked for an increase in quantity, quality, volume, length an overall health and didn't see a difference unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great serum 😁
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My lashes are noticeably thicker, fuller and curl as well. I started to see a difference in less then a week. Great product that I will definitely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Brows look darker & fuller
customer_reviews.text: On recommendation from a relative, I tried this item. It works! Bought it for my lashes which are sparse, short & straight - - like, almost invisible. Applying false lashes, extensions etc. used in my 20's no longer appealed. After 2 months, (and you need to be patient) lashes are definitely longer, and maybe a little fuller. Used on brows and results are undeniable. Applying once daily, still on first bottle, and it has been almost 3 months! Only drawback is minor itching, but my skin is sensitive anyway. Years of frustration traded for minor discomfort. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Sanjuan

customer_reviews.title: Just, WOW. 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I, like many others in the early 2000s, over-plucked my eyebrows like crazy. Unfortunately they’ve had a REALLY hard time growing back ever since, particularly my right eyebrow. Now they’re super uneven as the right won’t grow inwards towards my nose, so it’s much shorter than my left eyebrow. I’ve only used this product twice so far (I suck at consistency) and I have new growth on my brow line where I haven’t had growth in 10+ years!!! I mean seriously, how!? Anyway, 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Get it you won’t regret it !
customer_reviews.text: Lindaaaaa Listen to me this product right here works. I am not going to lie I was skeptical at first but now I’m a believer. I’ve always had short lashes but not anymore due to this product I wasn’t even consistent with application. I used on both my bottom and my top lashes and have had great results a little goes a long way and make sure you add equal amounts to each eye. It saw results quickly too experienced no irritation and I have sensitive skin. Buy it don’t waste money on expensive Lastisse or whatever it’s called try this first.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash Serum that is Elegant and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for beautiful lashes this is your go to! I started using this product in March! It is relatively inexpensive compared to many of the products out there and it does the job!!! I apply every single night and my lashes are longer, thicker, and the number of questions and compliments I get are amazing! I could not be happier with this product! It is my go to and I order once a month! Only change I would make is trying to get it on a Subscribe and Save status so that I can simply keep getting it! Don't hesitate, order today!
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting money on expensive products- try this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using lash boost for two years and was sick of spending so much money for such a small tube. So, I jumped on amazon to see if there were any alternative options and decided to try out Essy eyelash serum. Ladies, my lashes have never been so full and long! This product blows anything I’ve ever used out of the water at a fraction of the price. I saw my sister the other day and she thought I had on fake lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Reading junkie

customer_reviews.title: Luscious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a Christmas gift (she asked for it). She's been using it for several months now and I swear, it looks as though she's wearing false lashes or extensions. This stuff works. Not only are her lashes long but they're really thick. I myself have been using Latisse from the dermatologist but mine look nothing like hers. I'm going to get a tube of this for myself after I'm done with my current round of Latisse. Mine are longer...but not fuller. I'm thinking this could help. Buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Melly Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Extremely Effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product almost every night (I’ve missed a few nights) for the past two weeks and it is AMAZING. After reading all of the other reviews, I decided to purchase this since the cost was drastically less than other popular brands. Well, the Essy eyelash growth serum works. My eyelashes have visibly gotten longer and when I now apply mascara, they look beautiful. I wish I had taken a before photo to show people. I’d definitely recommend this to others looking to grow their lashes. Last thing I will say is that it’s super easy to apply and doesn’t irritate my eyes. I swipe it on every night before bed and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: KMGZAC

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed longer, fuller lashes in the month I've used the product. I've paid much more on other products without success. This product is non-irritating and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I started using this product I barely had any eyelashes. I had been getting eyelash extensions but the quarantine put an end to that. So I read many reviews and I ended up trying this serum. It took about 6 weeks because my eyelashes were practically gone when I began using this product. But it really worked!! My lashes are longer and thicker than I have ever experienced. I used it in the bottom lashes too. If your lashes are really sparse like mine were- just be patient. Apply every night. It does work!!
customer_reviews.author: cfcfaulk

customer_reviews.title: Long Lashes!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is seriously great! I've been using it for about a year now, so it's basically just KEEPING my lashes long -- and thick. When I first started, I had short, sort of sparse eyelashes. Within about a month, there was a NOTICEABLE difference, and after two months, it was amazing! I've continued to use it (every night) and it's maintained my length, so I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: nanfit

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! 55 and my lashes were shorter and very fine. Mascara helped, but not like this! I am still on my first tube of serum and I have an actual fringe of lashes! Both upper and lower lashes are much longer and more even the ends are thicker. I still wear mascara to darken them up. I am wearing mascara here, but the difference is even dramatic without it.
customer_reviews.author: dashnj

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the BEST lash serum I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the VERY expensive prescription in the past. I've even tried another brand similar to Essy. But hands down Essy is the best and I'll be buying from them again (this was my SECOND purchase). My lashes were so short prior to using this. I had extensions done in the past that I felt ruined my lashes for good. But I was able to grow them with this serum and, although they aren't thicker, they are definitely LONGER. I love the way my lashes look now! Edited to say that after checking my previous orders through Amazon, I've actually purchased this FOUR times already over the past two years. I loooove this product.
customer_reviews.author: SDRochelle

customer_reviews.title: Best lash serum I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give it a solid month before I reviewed this lash serum....I cannot believe how awesome this brand is! I have gotten fast results, no irritation, and so many compliments. People thought I have lash extensions....I have tried at least 6 lash serums over the past several years, done a lash lift, had lash extensions and by far this was the most successful, cost effective, true result product I have used. I cannot recommend Essy enough...folks stop wasting your time and money and buy this product, you will not regret it. Finally a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I was hesitant at first but noticed the change in my lashes by the end of the first week. Sounds too good to be true right? Well it is, and the way i know is because I had a bald patch in section of my eyelashes (due to bad extensions), after a week the bald spot began to look filled! They aren’t growing as long as I would like, but that may take time! They are definitely growing fuller and somewhat thicker! Don’t have any cons to mention! Thankful this serum didn’t make my lashes fall out or change my eye colour (some serums do that). Definitely will be repurchasing once this tube runs out!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I had mink extensions on for a few months prior to use and when the pandemic hit I couldn't get them refilled. My eyelashes were short and straight because of the use of extensions. After using this product, I don't even feel the need to wear mascara now my eyelashes are long and curled up and I'm super happy with them. I've used lash boost in the past but I feel this worked faster. Will be purchasing again. Causes slight itching sometimes, but lash boost did much worse.
customer_reviews.author: J. BALUCH

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!! I saw results in less than a week! I get complements everyday and usually get asked where I get my lashes "done". Try this product, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stirrup

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but it's hard to tell when the product is really getting low. It seemed to begin to get thinner, even dripping off the applicator stem more than sticking to the brush. I am not reordering it, but trying the Origins version instead (cheaper and 4k reviews with 80+% satisfied)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Leonard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this daily for 3-1/2 months. I love my lashes now! This works as well for me as Lash Boost by Rodan and Fields. I tried a couple other leading Amazon brands in between and one didn’t do anything and the other my lashes largely broke at my monthly lash tint. Like all but one of the others, it does irritate my skin if I get it on it and don’t wipe it off, so I apply it about 1/16” up my lashes. Like all of them, I wash my face before bed, apply lotion everywhere but my lashes, and THEN apply the lash conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Star

customer_reviews.title: Does not cause eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product based on other reviews about it not causing the same eye irritation that other more expensive lash serums have caused me. It does seem to deliver on that claim. I have been using for almost two weeks now without any itching on burning on my eye lids (which was occurring with other brands). I see some growth in my lashes but probably not as much as I saw with the other product I have tried. I guess you have to take the good with the bad. All in all, it is a good price and worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: smokey

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I am 51 and my eyelashes got really short and not very many were there. I have used several products and some works better than others but I have been very happy with this product. It also works on eyebrows. I really wish this product had been available when I was younger because my eyelashes would have been off the charts. I have gone from almost no eyelashes to really long pretty ones. It is nice because I am not a person who would put on false eyelashes, or get eyelash extensions. Not a kardashian. Just a regular older lady who likes having eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Delia O'connor

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Babe
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Babe Lash for awhile and loving it but when I went to reorder it was out of stock. If you’ve used these products before you know you don’t want to stop or you have to restart and wait like 2 weeks for results. Essy had good reviews so I thought I’d try it. So far I’ve been using for a month and haven’t noticed any difference. The length and overall lash health and volume I was getting from Babe is still there!!! I’m super happy and will be ordering this one again because it’s just as good for about half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Smith

customer_reviews.title: My lashes are so long and full, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, my eyelashes are long and curl upward now. I don’t use an eyelash curler anymore. Essy brand didn’t burn my eyes like Alphaeon did (I had to stop using Alphaeon because my eyes were always red). And Essy was less expensive. I will order again soon!
customer_reviews.author: lulumama

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER leave reviews for anything. I just can't commit the time for that, but I have to let you guys know, this product actually works. Nothing works on me lol. I have the most stubborn yet sensitive skin and nothing I order EVER works for me. SO when it does, I'm in shock and awe. Not only did I notice results after about a week, after 3 my lashes were almost 50% fuller and longer. I swear it pulls out lashes you didn't know you had. I've tried extensions, falsies, everything irritates my skin, but this formula was non-irritating. So gentle, so kind to your skin. Must purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be doing the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 3 weeks now. I did not have high expectations, but for a third of the price of other lash serums that are on the market, I decided I'd give it a shot. The 1st photo is day 1. Photos 2 and 3 are about 3 weeks later (#3 is obviously with mascara) Curious how they will look in another 3 weeks! I have also been using on my brows, but have not noticed a much growth there yet. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Williams

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: So my lashes were falling out pretty quickly and thinning because of my eyelash extensions. My technician told me to find an eyelash serum or else she would have to halt the extensions for a while. Panicked as I couldn’t afford to spend money on products like Larissa, I turned to good ole Amazon. I took a chance on this product, though I was skeptical since I’ve never heard of it. Yall, After about 6 weeks my technician was in awe of how my lashes had transformed. I couldn’t really tell since I still had extensions in but she said they’re definitely longer and thicker! I’m a happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: ltn

customer_reviews.title: Essy Naturals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn eyelash extensions for the past 2 years straight without taking a break and recently decided that i should give my lashes time to breathe and noticed that they had thinned out tremendously. I did research and came across this product, I’ve been using this product for a little over 2 weeks now and have seen a great amount of growth in my lashes just over the short period of time. I can see that my lashes have started to grow back from the root, as well as the existing lashes becoming thicker than before. I can’t wait to see what 2 months of use will do for me!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought this item 6 times and I absolutely love the results! I have recommended this product to multiple people and everyone that has bought it agrees that it works really well. My eyelashes had gotten destroyed from water proof mascara and I felt the need to wear fake eyelashes (which is such a pain)... now my natural eyelashes are longer than the old fake ones I used to wear and I get asked all the time if they are fake or how I do it! Also I am allergic to preservatives (propylene glycol) so I did a lot of research and this product is more natural than others 😊 you won’t be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Branson

customer_reviews.title: Results Will Come
customer_reviews.text: Like all things, good things come when you wait. After 3 mos of use, I noticed a huge difference in lash length but not quantity. Prior to this, each stand looked stronger and thicker. At 4 mos, the abundance came through. Took me 6 mos to use one tube. I applied it 3-4 times a week. The only drawback....it really dries my eyes. Unsure what will happen to the lashes if I stop using the serum for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th bottle. I have been using it since June and can notice a dramatic change in my lashes. They are longer and thicker. When I curl them they even touch my eyebrows! I put this serum right before I go to sleep so it doesn't irritate my eyes too much. My eyes are sensitive and if I put them on during the day I can feel something even if it doesn't bother me too much, so I prefer to put it at bedtime. Definitely recommend buying it. Oh, and shipment was prompt!
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Takes some time to notice the growth.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be used on my sparse eyebrow hairs and this product worked for me after 3 weeks. For me it took sometime but I can see my eyebrows at the end where there was nothing, is becoming thicker and filling in. This is my 2nd tube I purchased and I will keep using it as it does work for me.
customer_reviews.author: ricochet rabbit 212

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: I will say right away that I am 79 yrs old and have never had lush eyelashes. The Essy eye product gave me eyelashes that were commented on by people I did not know. It worked so well that I have given it as gifts for my sister and daughter. I am on my third container but do not know how long one is supposed to last as it is hard to tell if it is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as $100 products on the market
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitating on this purchase because I was unsure it would live up to its reviews. I have seen results from others on $100 products claiming to do the same but I didn’t want to spend that kind of money on this kind of a product. Needless to say it works wonderfully!! Super excited to see results within the first week! My eyelashes aren’t falling out and they are getting longer and thicker, my mascara works better as a result too! Definetly going to keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinerose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed even after a week
customer_reviews.text: I'm lucky to already have naturally pretty long eyelashes, but after a struggle with some health issues, my hair and lashes suffered a bit. I've only been using this for a week, though I use it every night and also again in the morning. I notice a definite difference in the health of my lashes. Not sure why, but they also look darker in color? (Normally they're light brown). People think I'm wearing mascara when I'm not. Will definitely continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it promises
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!! I purchased a major brand that was pretty expensive. It few my lashes but they were still thin. I saw Essy Naturals on Amazon. I read all of the reviews and figured I’d give it a try. What did I have to lose? The price was great. After about two I started to notice a difference bag within a month I couldn’t believe. My new natural lashes are long but when I use mascara my lashes look I’m wearing falsies. The results are outstanding!!!! Finally a product that does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Daneal

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but decided to give it try. Within 1 month I could already see a difference in my lashes, but 4 months now and they're just beautiful. I'm impressed. They're way longer, and much fuller. The serum doesn't burn, which is awesome because most products burn the area around my eyes. Now when I put mascara on it looks like I'm wearing falsies. 😅🙌♥️
customer_reviews.author: MrsGoodwrench16

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I originally received this as a gift from my mother-in-law. After the first two weeks I almost stopped using it because I didn't think it was working. But I gave it the full recommended 4-6 weeks and I'm so glad I did! This truly has made my lashes thicker and longer and I need far less coats of mascara. Only downside is it can make your eyelids/lash area a little bit itchy, but I usually put it on before bed and don't notice it. If you are in doubt- buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: coldcalifornian

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash growth serum really does work! Long lashes will not appear over night but with consistent use, your lashes will start growing! It took me over a month to see results. It is so much fun putting on mascara now and seeing how much longer my eyelashes are! I never used to put mascara on my bottom lashes because they were nonexistent. Now the bottom lashes are growing also. The serum does not sting my eyes and I have not had any negative reactions to the serum.
customer_reviews.author: heartsintexas

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken a picture before I started using this product! My eyelashes were extremely short and even with mascara, you could barely see them. After about 4 weeks of using this product I have beautiful looking eyelashes! I have never had eyelashes this pretty and I am very happy using this product. I do recommend only using this product at night. I did apply 2x a day the first day and my eye lids were burning. Since that day, I apply 1x at night and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lashes look like extensions!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for a little over a month now, it was recommended by my aesthetician that does my eyelash extensions that I get a serum to help with regrowth of my natural lashes under my extensions. However I am noticing now as my current extensions are falling out that my real eyelashes are actually almost as long and thick as my extensions. May just let them all fall out/get them removed! This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective lash boost and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken before and after photos for this product. Does it work? Yes, I have seen noticeable change in my lash growth. I have light colored eyelashes, so it isn’t as visible without mascara. I have received many compliments from people who have known me a long time and can see the change. I haven’t noticed as much of a difference in my eyebrows with application. Additionally, I have very sensitive skin, and have had zero irritation from product application. The product does lose potency after about 60 days after opening. I have repurchased this product several times. I am not receiving any form of compensation for this review.
customer_reviews.author: anne9803

customer_reviews.title: and it works pretty fast. Not kidding
customer_reviews.text: Honestly...It works, and it works pretty fast. Not kidding, it's doing what it says it does and on a middle aged man, it's sort of amazing to see your eyes looking more like they did in your 20s. I know there were some bogus high reviews for this product, but they really needn't have bothered because the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clerkin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical but my lashes were thinning so much I was desperate. I started using this a couple months ago. I was amazed at the change. My husband actually asked if I was wearing false eyelashes! Granted, I also stopped curling my eyelashes and wearing mascara every day so I’m sure that helped. But my lashes have never looked like this. Much longer and thicker. Now I just put a little Vaseline on a eyelash brush and use that instead of mascara. Looks great and no more raccoon eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a lightning deal...I was apprehensive...to my surprise, my lashes ( after 4 weeks of not even daily use) are tucked and longer. I have blonde eyelashes and they are visible without mascara 😁
customer_reviews.author: west

customer_reviews.title: Shocked that it works!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I used Rodan + Fields lash boost, while it worked it was way too expensive to keep up that habit. Since then I've been on the hunt for something that actually worked, and look no further bc this DOES! I started to see some growth after 2 weeks using nightly. The consistency seems a bit more thin, which makes me think it will last longer than the R&F or even L'oreal lash serum (which did nothing for me). Now that I feel my lashes are longer I can skip a night here or there and not feel worried about skipping. Great value, Great product! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: monica martinez

customer_reviews.title: Better than Latisse!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Latisse for years and have become spoiled to the results. However, I decided to try Essy Naturals Growth Serum due to the ease of ordering (rather than a prescription) and better price. This product beats Latisse hands down. The results are comparable when it comes to lash length and thickness. But the bonus is my lashes are much softer and not brittle feeling like with Latisse. I'm sold on this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Brunton

customer_reviews.title: Better price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 other products prior to this one. Both a little more spendy than easy. The 1st worked well but I didn't like the price. I tried the 2nd one for the same price and was disappointed. I decided to check out the products on Amazon and read reviews. Easy had the best reviews and a reasonable price. I have been using it for almost 2 weeks and I can already see a difference. My eyelashes break and my mascara looks uneven. Now that I'm using essy I can see the growth and that the areas I'm concerned about are already getting fuller. I will be using this product more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can notice growth in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had lash extensions and since the Corona virus shutdown can no longer get my lashes. After taking extensions off my lashes were very short. Apparently the extensions hindered the growth of my natural lashes. So decided to take this time to try lash growth serum and avoid getting lash extensions again. After 3 weeks I do notice a difference. They are starting to grow, Again and thicker to. Yay so Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Naoko Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Used to use Latesse
customer_reviews.text: When my eyelashes started to thin and get shorter at age 50 my eye doctor gave me a prescription for latesse which I used for 10 years. When my insurance caused me to go to another doctor that doctor wouldn't prescibe latesse, I had to find something else. I found Essy and have been so happy. It works just as well as latesse at 1/4 the price. It is so easy to use and doesn't leave small iritated areas on my lids as latesse did. Wonderful product I will be using for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The picture above is from October 2nd and the picture below is from November 8. Not a considerable difference. I bought this product after eye lash extensions. my lashes and they were noticeably shorter. In the picture above I still have some of the extensions on so keep that in mind when comparing the images. Expected better results after using the product religiously for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: lyanna banana

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash growth serum
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! I was getting eyelash extensions and during the quarantine they’ll fell out. I felt bald with no lashes!! I saw a blogger/influencer, Melissa Cole (ellabrooksblog) recommend this. I’m very pleased! It will take about about a month to see a noticeable difference...but IT WORKS!! When I put my mascara on now my lashes look so good!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Palmer

customer_reviews.title: This product works and I saw results very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It works and my fine barely there lashes are thicker and longer since I began using this. This is the se one order of serum BECAUSE IT WORKS! I have tried a couple lash serums that boast great results, but did not work. Happy to have found Essy and will continue to use and recommend to others. Great product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: dpbbab

customer_reviews.title: Amazing unexpected results
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash serum is amazing. I started to notice growth and thickening after just a few weeks. By the time I finished my first tube I was constantly getting comments on my lashes. Some people thought they were fake because they are so long and definitely thicker than ever. Last week my dermatologist walked in and the first thing she said was “first of all, your eyelashes are gorgeous.” She walked out and her nurse came in and first thing she said was “omg you have beautiful lashes.” I said I use Essy and purchased on Amazon. I tried The $200 stuff and this product has done way more for my lashes. Absolutely love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R.

customer_reviews.title: Irritates eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week, and im not too pleased with it. It almost turns my eyes red when i wake up and also makes my upper eyelid look darker. I've stopped using it and don't plan on getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lenka

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I started this three months before my wedding. I had non-existent eye lashes and very thin eye brows. After a month I could tell there was a difference and after three I'm ecstatic with the results. I wish I had a before and after picture but lashes have doubled if not tripled in length and fullness. Same with my brows where they were scarce. LOVE this product. Also did not irritate eyes or skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash serum review
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my eyebrows and eyelashes. It does work but it takes awhile for me. I use it every night before I go to bed and I have used it for about a month and a half. My eyebrows have grown a lot more than my lashes it seems, however there was some growth in the lashes as well. One thing I noticed though is after your eyelashes get a certain length they won’t grow past that. It’s comfortable and if it gets into your eyes it doesn’t sting so that’s always nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definite success!
customer_reviews.text: From reading the other reviews, I was hoping to see lash lengthening and thickening after a couple of weeks of use. I used for around 3-4 weeks before I saw any change, but it suddenly happened around the 4 week mark. My lashes are so much longer, a little fuller and healthier looking. When I'm wearing mascara, I'm so happy with how my lashes look - strong and long and healthy. I've even been asked if I've had extensions put on. Will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: LiveinHK

customer_reviews.title: so effective and no irritation
customer_reviews.text: I had been getting eyelash extensions for years, finally pulled the plug and was left with stubs that barely count as eyelashes. I purchased another highly rated serum that made my eyes bloodshot and irritated. I purchased this as a last ditch effort... you guys! I refer this to everyone, as I’m constantly asked if my eyelashes are real. essy lash serum at night + primer + mascara + curler = dream lashes. thank you essy!!
customer_reviews.author: hensley

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product at such a good price as I'd been programmed to believe it needed to be $100+ to work. I was so wrong! Although at times the product isn't easy to get on the brush from the bottle, one swipe per lash line per evening really helped my lashes grow. I had no irritation or issues at all. I have bought several times and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Barron

customer_reviews.title: Give it time!
customer_reviews.text: Update on the review I left. I had originally left a one star review because this serum did nothing for my eyelashes. Put on my mascara this morning and WOW! My eyelashes looked they almost doubled in length. I guess you have to give this stuff time to work!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline 711

customer_reviews.title: this serum really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used an eyelash serum before and I was pretty skeptical but decided to try this one since it was a reasonable price and there were no irritants or reports of any allergic reactions (my eyes tend to be very sensitive). Within a week I saw improvement in my lashes, within two weeks even more (longer, denser) - even my eyebrows. I then tried Hairgenics (highest rated on Amazon) because it was so much cheaper on other sites and because of its ratings. It did absolutely nothing. So I went back to the Essy, an when Amazon had the Essy on deal I purchased two more.
customer_reviews.author: vickie m.

product_meta.title: EssyNaturals Eyelash and Brow Growth Serum Irritation Free Formula - 'Dermatologist Certified' - Guaranteed Results in Just 3-4 Weeks for Longer, Thicker, and Fuller Eyelashes
product_meta.description: Advanced Formula for Longer and Thicker Lashes - Essy Eyelash Growth Serum & Eyelash Enhancer was specially created to strengthen, magnify, prime and lengthen your natural lashes and brows.
feature_bullets: Advanced Formula for Longer and Thicker Lashes - Essy Eyelash Growth Serum & Eyelash Enhancer was specially created to strengthen, magnify, prime and lengthen your natural lashes and brows.
Clinically Proven - Our formula has been proven to help boost thickness and length of eyelashes with only 2 weeks of daily use. Over 6 weeks of daily use saw a 55% increase of natural eyelashes.

Nourishing and Natural Ingredients - Essy Beauty's formula is non-irritating, gentle and safe for all skin types. It is a nourishing serum that will help frail lashes and brows to grow stronger and healthier with daily use.

Easy to Use - With the applicator tip, apply serum to the root area of the upper eyelashes or brows, similar to eyeliner application. The serum works great as a primer as well. Use daily and let the eyelash serum work its magic.

Brand Story - Essy Beauty is a natural and luxurious beauty line dedicated to crafting personal care products with the finest formulations for a more beautiful you. Our team of skincare experts carefully curate Mother Nature’s purest ingredients to help men and women around the world age gracefully.
